name: Special Needs
wikiSummary: Special Needs is a single by alternative rock band Placebo. Taken from Sleeping with Ghosts, their fourth album, it reached number 27 in the UK singles chart. The video is filmed in an empty swimming pool, and includes a boy and a girl in separate changing rooms making love to thin air.
wikiText:
Special Needs is a single by alternative rock band Placebo. Taken from Sleeping with Ghosts, their fourth album, it reached number 27 in the UK singles chart. The video is filmed in an empty swimming pool, and includes a boy and a girl in separate changing rooms making love to thin air.
